post:
Hello WHT!

We are happy to provide the opportunity to get 75% off of a VPS service with us for life! That includes during product upgrades! Just use the code below to claim your discount when placing your order. Extend your discounts by pre-paying for quarterly, semi-annual, or annual billing.

We accept Paypal, Bitcoin, and all major credit cards!

https://cometvps.com/

Free 2Gbps DDoS Protection is provided with every server! IPv6 is available upon request on all packages.

Need cPanel? We can provide that too, just select it during checkout!
